function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to distance learning due to limited internet and technology in developing countries","Impact":"Increased educational inequality, higher dropout rates, increased need for childcare","Mitigation":"Investment in infrastructure for internet access and technology, support for safe and supportive learning environments","Technologies":"Infrastructure for internet access, provision of computers and tablets","People":"Students in developing countries","Owner":"Government, NGOs, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Exacerbation of gender inequality due to the impact of the pandemic on women and girls","Impact":"Increased burden of unpaid care work, rise of domestic violence, decline in women's economic empowerment, exclusion from leadership roles, interrupted access to sexual and reproductive health","Mitigation":"Support for women's economic empowerment, measures to address domestic violence, promotion of gender equality in leadership and decision-making, access to sexual and reproductive health services","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Women and girls","Owner":"Government, NGOs, women's rights organizations"},{"Description":"Widening of income and wealth inequalities globally due to the pandemic","Impact":"Increased poverty for low-income individuals, lack of resources reaching the poor, exacerbation of economic crisis, especially in Africa","Mitigation":"Economic support for low-income individuals, distribution of resources to the poor, measures to address the economic crisis, targeted support for African countries","Technologies":"Economic support programs, distribution networks for resources","People":"Low-income individuals, vulnerable populations in African countries","Owner":"Government, international organizations, aid agencies"}]}
